text: Baugy () is a commune in the Cher department in the Centre-Val de Loire region of central France. The former communes Laverdines and Saligny-le-Vif were merged into Baugy on 1 January 2019.Arrêté préfectoral 18 October 2018 It has a population of around 1,665 as of January 2019. ==Population== ==References== Category:Communes in Cher
title: Baugy, Cher
